name: Tapsailing
description:
Balance the steering wheel on your ship and soar throughthe stormy, 1-bit, not to mention kind of static sea!

But don't ignore your crew, they get real loud when there's
an emergency, and they drain your ship's order fast!

Made in less than 72 hours for GMC Jam 4 (new), theme: Voyage

Font used: Blocko
Sfx made using: Bfxr
